Table of Contents

Name

python - document python support in NEMO

Description

Python support is rather sparse and haphasard in NEMO. Here we document those

proper modules: 

      unsio

support scripts 

      tabplot.py - simple tabplot(1NEMO) style program, see also tabplot
pyplot=
      rotcur.py - support for plotting
jupyter notebooks 
      $NEMO/nemo_start_example.ipynb - some examples

See Also

nemoinp(1NEMO) , data(5NEMO) , unsio(3NEMO)

Author

Peter Teuben

Update History


5-jul-2020    drafted        PJT
